outputs.output_descr: By providing timely updates on progresses, achievement and challenges, the Project serves as a coordination platform that links the efforts of various UN agencies, stakeholders and the mass media. It also provided to other UN sister agencies that do not have physical presence in China, e.g. OCHA, access to critical information and provision of needed technical supported as required by the Government. This project also support the needs assessment and initiating early recovery framework.

project_descr: Earthquake Relief and Early Recovery Project in China
